title: Web 2.0-Based Mathematical Competency Enhancement Program Using Virtual Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematical concepts and work-related data analysis experience
context.additional_context: Designing mobile device-based learning activities for working professionals, integrating real-time collaboration tools and Web 2.0 platforms

learning_goals: Share and collaborate on mathematical problem-solving processes with peers using Web 2.0 tools
Accurately understand over 80% of work-applicable mathematical concepts through mobile-delivered microlearning content
Periodically diagnose and improve mathematical competencies via feedback-based formative assessments in virtual learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
